manufacturing.power_criticality: Production line shutdowns cost ₦2-10M per hour
common_pain_points: Equipment damage from voltage fluctuations
Production schedule disruptions
Quality control issues during power transitions
Worker safety during generator switchovers
Inventory spoilage during extended outages
manufacturing.budget_cycles: Annual capex planning (Oct-Dec), quarterly opex reviews

common_pain_points: ATM network downtime loses customer trust
Data center cooling failures risk server damage
Branch operations halt during outages
Backup generator noise complaints from neighbors
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities during power transitions
banking_financial.roi_expectations: Business continuity value > cost savings focus

healthcare.power_criticality: Patient safety trumps all cost considerations
common_pain_points: Life support equipment failures during outages
Vaccine/medicine spoilage in storage
Surgery postponements due to power uncertainty
Generator exhaust affecting patient areas
Staff productivity loss during manual operations
healthcare.roi_expectations: Patient safety and regulatory compliance primary, cost secondary

telecommunications.power_criticality: Network downtime directly impacts revenue (₦50M+ per hour for major operators)
common_pain_points: Base station outages affect network coverage
Data center cooling failures risk equipment damage
Customer churn due to service interruptions
Fuel theft at remote base stations
Generator maintenance costs across thousands of sites
telecommunications.budget_cycles: Quarterly infrastructure reviews, annual capex planning
telecommunications.roi_expectations: Revenue protection focus, 6-12 month payback acceptable
